A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: To quote Lucas\, a beautifully made film that unfortunately misreads one of the fundamental characters from the original trilogy. This is not a Star Wars film ... and plot holes abound. \n\nIt is incredibly difficult to write this as someone who was genuinely excited for Rian to be onboad this franchise but this film has now the additional effect of making what little was intriguing about its predecessor\, irrelevant.
